armorhud.config.title: ArmorHUD Settings
armorhud.config.enabled.tooltip: Toggle the armor HUD overlay on or off.
armorhud.config.orientation.tooltip: Display armor pieces vertically or horizontally.
armorhud.config.show_durability_number.t: Show or hide the durability number next to each armor piece.
armorhud.config.durability_position.tool: Display the durability number on the left or right side of the armor icon.
armorhud.config.show_bar.tooltip: Show the vanilla durability bar on each armor piece.
armorhud.config.show_glint.tooltip: Show the enchantment shimmer on enchanted armor in the HUD.
armorhud.config.scale.tooltip: Adjust the size of the armor HUD. 100% is default.
armorhud.config.static_color_mode.toolti: Use a single fixed color for all durability numbers instead of dynamic colors.
armorhud.config.static_color.tooltip: The color used when Static Color Mode is enabled.
armorhud.config.color.good.tooltip: Color when armor durability is above the warning threshold.
armorhud.config.color.warning.tooltip: Color when armor durability drops below the warning threshold.
armorhud.config.color.danger.tooltip: Color when armor durability drops below the danger threshold.
armorhud.config.warning_percent.tooltip: Show warning color when durability is below this percentage. Default: 50%
armorhud.config.danger_percent.tooltip: Show danger color when durability is below this percentage. Default: 25%
armorhud.options.title: ArmorHUD
armorhud.position.title: Adjust HUD Position
armorhud.position.hint: Click and drag the HUD to reposition
